sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Card, Icon, Image, Container, GridColumn, Grid } from 'semantic-ui-react' import '../css/UserProfile.css' import { FaLinkedin, FaGithubSquare, FaInstagram, FaFacebookSquare, FaTwitterSquare, FaGooglePlusSquare, FaEdit } from 'react-icons/fa'; import CvService from '../services/CvService'; import AbilityService from "../services/AbilityService"; export default function UserProfile() { const [cv, setCv] = useState([]); const [abilities, setAbility] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let cvService = new CvService() let abilityService = new AbilityService() abilityService.getByJobSeekerId(1).then(result => setAbility(result.data.data)); cvService.getByJobSeekerId(1).then(result => setCv(result.data.data)); }, []); return (
Matthew Joined in 2015 Matthew is a musician living in Nashville.

Education
{cv.educations ? cv.educations.map((education) => ( )) : ""}

Experiences
{cv.experiences > 0 ? cv.experiences.map((ability) => ( )) :

This user has no exist experience

 }

Abilities
{cv.abilities ? cv.abilities.map((ability) => ( )) :

This user has no exist ability

}

Abilities
{cv.languages ? cv.languages.map((language) => ( )) :

This user has no exist ability

}

Social Media
{cv.socialMedia[0].gitHub ? : ""} {cv.socialMedia.instagram ? : ""} {cv.socialMedia.facebook ? : ""} {cv.socialMedia.twitter ? : ""} {cv.socialMedia.google ? : ""}
) }
